id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called whenever any of the
properties change

width.description: Width of the figure to draw, in pixels

height.description: Height of the figure to draw, in pixels

padding.description: Pixels to leave blank around the edges

innerRadius.description:
Radius, in pixels, for the inner circle when you're zoomed in,
that you click on to zoom back out

transitionDuration.description: Animation duration when you click around selecting subtrees

data.description:
The sunburst data. Should have the form:

  `{name: '...', children: [c0, c1, c2]}`

and children `c<i>` can have the same form to arbitrary nesting,
or for leaf nodes the form is:

  `{name: '...', size: ###}`

dataVersion.description: Optional version id for data, to avoid having to diff a large object

selectedPath.description:
The currently selected path within the sunburst
as an array of child names

updatemode.description:
If 'replace', then the graph is completely replaced on updates
if 'animate', then the graph tweens between updates.
Use 'replace' if you are generating data server side
